disable_http2.description: Whether to disable HTTP/2 listen in ddev-router.

fail_on_hook_fail.description: Whether ddev start should be interrupted by a failing hook, on a single project or for all projects if used globally.

instrumentation_queue_size.description: Maximum number of locally collected events for instrumentation reporting.

instrumentation_reporting_interval.description: Reporting interval in hours for instrumentation reporting.

instrumentation_user.description: Specific name identifier for instrumentation reporting.

letsencrypt_email.description: Email associated with Let's Encrypt feature. (Works in conjunction with use_letsencrypt.) (Not currently compatible with Traefik router.)

mailpit_http_port.description: Port for project's Mailpit HTTP URL.

mailpit_https_port.description: Port for project's Mailpit HTTPS URL.

messages.description: Configure messages like the Tip of the Day.

mkcert_caroot.description: The absolute path to the directory containing mkcert certificates using "mkcert -CAROOT" command.

no_bind_mounts.description: Whether to not use Docker bind mounts.

omit_containers.description: A list of container types that should not be started when the project is started.

performance_mode.description: Defines the performance optimization mode to be used. Currently Mutagen asynchronous caching and NFS are supported. Mutagen is enabled by default on Mac and Windows.

project_tld.description: Set the top-level domain to be used for projects, defaults to ddev.site (default "ddev.site").

router.description: The PHP version the project should use.

router_bind_all_interfaces.description: Whether to bind ddev-router's ports on all network interfaces.

router_http_port.description: The router HTTP port for this project.

router_https_port.description: The router HTTPS port for this project.

simple_formatting.description: Whether to disable most ddev list and ddev describe table formatting.

table_style.description: Style for ddev list and ddev describe.

traefik_monitor_port.description: Specify an alternate port for the Traefik (ddev-router) monitor port. This defaults to 10999 and rarely needs to be changed, but can be changed in cases of port conflicts.

use_docker_compose_from_path.description: Whether to use the system-installed docker-compose. You can otherwise use required_docker_compose_version to specify a version for download.

use_hardened_images.description: Whether to use hardened images for internet deployment.

use_letsencrypt.description: Whether to enable Let's Encrypt integration. (Works in conjunction with letsencrypt_email.) (Not currently compatible with Traefik router.)

web_environment.description: Add environment variables to the web container.

wsl2_no_windows_hosts_mgt.description: (WSL2 only) Whether to disable the management and checking of the Windows hosts file. By default, when using WSL2, DDEV manages the system-wide hosts file on the Windows side (normally C:\Windows\system32\drivers\etc\hosts) by using ddev.exe installed on the Windows side. This normally works better for all applications, including browsers and IDEs. However, this behavior can be disabled by setting wsl_no_windows_hosts_mgt: true.

xdebug_ide_location.description: Adjust Xdebug listen location for WSL2 or in-container.
